tasks.description: Masking some of the words in a sentence and predicting which words should replace those masks.

translation.description: 在句子中遮蔽某些单词并预测哪些单词应该替换这些遮蔽内容.

tasks.description: Retrieve the answer to a question from a given text.

translation.description: 从给定文本中检索问题的答案.

tasks.description: Determining how similar two texts are.

translation.description: 确定两个文本有多相似.

tasks.description: Producing a shorter version of a document while preserving its important information.

translation.description: 生成文档的较短版本，同时保留其重要信息.

tasks.description: Answering a question about information from a given table.

translation.description: 回答与给定表中信息相关的问题.

tasks.description: Assigning a label or class to a given text.

translation.description: 将标签或类别分配给给定文本.

tasks.description: Producing new text by predicting the next word in a sequence.

translation.description: 通过预测序列中的下一个单词来生成新文本.

tasks.description: Converting one text sequence into another text sequence.

translation.description: 将一个文本序列转换为另一个文本序列.

tasks.description: Assigning a label to each token in a text.

translation.description: 为文本中的每个分词分配一个标签.

tasks.description: Converting text from one language to another.

translation.description: 将文本从一种语言转换为另一种语言.

tasks.description: Classifying text into classes that are unseen during training.

translation.description: 将文本分类到训练过程中未见过的类别.

tasks.description: Transforming raw data into numerical features that can be processed while preserving the information in the original dataset.

translation.description: 将原始数据转换为可以在处理过程中使用的数值特征，同时保留原始数据集的信息.

tasks.description: Predicting the depth of objects present in an image.

translation.description: 预测图像中物体的深度.

tasks.description: Assigning a label or class to an entire image.

translation.description: 为整个图像分配一个标签或类别.

tasks.description: Divides an image into segments where each pixel is mapped to an object. This task has multiple variants such as instance segmentation, panoptic segmentation and semantic segmentation.

translation.description: 将图像划分为多个区域，每个像素映射到一个对象。该任务有多种变体，例如实例分割、全景分割和语义分割.

tasks.description: Transforming a source image to match the characteristics of a target image or a target image domain.

translation.description: 将源图像转换为与目标图像或目标图像领域匹配的特性.

tasks.description: Generate masks for the objects in an image.

translation.description: 为图像中的对象生成掩膜.

tasks.description: Identify objects of certain defined classes within an image.

translation.description: 识别图像中某些定义类别的对象.

tasks.description: Assigning a label or class to an entire video.

translation.description: 为整个视频分配一个标签或类别.

tasks.description: Generating images with no condition in any context (like a prompt text or another image).

translation.description: 在没有任何条件（如提示文本或另一张图像）的情况下生成图像.

tasks.description: Transforming raw data into numerical features that can be processed while preserving the information in the original image.

translation.description: 将原始数据转换为可以在处理过程中使用的数值特征，同时保留原始图像的信息.

tasks.description: Assigning a label or class to a given audio.

translation.description: 为给定的音频分配一个标签或类别.

tasks.description: Generating audio from an input audio source.

translation.description: 从输入的音频源生成音频.

tasks.description: Transcribing a given audio into text.

translation.description: 将给定的音频转录为文本.

tasks.id: text to speech 或 text to audio
tasks.description: Generating natural sounding speech given text input.

translation.description: 根据文本输入生成自然声音的语音.

tasks.description: Classifying a target category (a group) based on a set of attributes.

translation.description: 根据一组属性对目标类别(一组)进行分类。

tasks.description: Predicting a numerical value given a set of attributes.

translation.description: 根据一组属性预测一个数值。

tasks.description: Answering questions on document images.

translation.description: 基于文档图像回答问题。

tasks.description: Output text from a given image.

translation.description: 从给定的图片生成文本。

tasks.description: Generates images from input text.

translation.description: 根据输入文本生成图片。

tasks.description: Answering open ended questions based on an image.

translation.description: 基于图片回答开放性问题。

tasks.description: Classifying audios into classes that are unseen during training.

translation.description: 将音频分类到训练中未见过的类别中。

tasks.description: Classifying images into classes that are unseen during training.

translation.description: 将图像分类到训练中未见过的类别中。

tasks.description: Identify objects of classes that are unseen during training.

translation.description: 识别训练中未见过类别的目标。

tasks.description: Learning from actions by interacting with an environment through trial and error and receiving rewards (negative or positive) as feedback.

translation.description: 通过与环境互动，通过试错和接收奖励（正向或负向）反馈来学习。
